roleset.name: make loud noises
roleset.note: RACKET-V NOTES: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. No verbnet class. No framenet mappings. Framed by Katie. (from racket.01-v)
RACKET-N NOTES: Based on ononons. Copy of racket.01-v. Framed by Katie. (from racket.01-n)

example.name: racket-v: make loud annoying noises
example.text: The wind racketed through the narrow space between the house and the hills.
example.arg: through the narrow space between the house and the hills.

example.name: racket-v: arg 0
example.text: The old man found the kids' racket unbearable.

roleset.name: engage in an illegal scheme
roleset.note: RACKET-N NOTES: Based on ononons. Comparison with con.01. Framed by Katie. (from racket.02-n)

example.name: racketeer-v
example.text: On his way from the Place Vendome, through Lyons, Avignon, the villages and towns of the Languedoc, and thence to the Pyrenees, he racketeered in shoes, soap, and blankets.
example.arg: On his way from the Place Vendome, through Lyons, Avignon, the villages and towns of the Languedoc, and thence to the Pyrenees,

example.name: racketeering-n
example.text: Scopo, a soldier in the Colombo Crime Family, was subsequently convicted of labor racketeering in the Commission case, United States v. Salerno, 85 CR 139 (S.D.N.Y. 1985). 23.
